content:
Based on our conversation so far, I would recommend the Meursault "Les Charmes" Domaine Jean-Marc Roulot as the best bottle of wine for pairing with the Grüner Veltliner Schloss Gobelsberg Ram and the blue egg dish. This wine is considered as one of the best Meursault Chardonnay. It's known for its rich, buttery flavors and a full-bodied texture, which would complement the Grüner Veltliner nicely and work well with the dish of blue eggs, sabayon, pickled mussel, seaweed bugak, and salt bush oil. The specific vintage that I would recommend would be 2018, as it is considered a good year for Meursault.

Please note that wine pairing is a matter of personal taste, so it's always a good idea to have a selection of wines available for your guests. And also, keep in mind that prices for this wine can vary depending on the importing company and the vintage, so it's always a good idea to check with the supplier for the current pricing and availability.
